item.title: Secret Sampling 🎅🤶
item.description: ’Tis the season for white elphant / גמד וענק / Yankee swap / secret santa-ing! There are various rules for this, for our version: 🏷 each participant receives the name of someone else to purchase a gift for 🎁 gifts are exchanged at a party 🤔 the receiver is tasked with guessing who the gift-giver was! We thought it’d be particularly fun to do it #rstats style. Assigning partners We had our classmates sign up if they were interested in a Google Form.
